text: #EdwardPatrickCorbett was a dear friend. DON’T let anyone tell you getting #COVID19 means you don’t need the #vaccine. Ed had TWO serious bouts in 2020 and the toll on his body took his life. He documented it pleading for people to be safe! #LivesWellLived @NicolleDWallace @MSNBC https://t.co/zpgG9SsnCK
